quoteText:
As a platform built with creator needs in mind, we welcome the use of stage names or professional identities on SoundCloud.
However, that doesnâ€™t mean that you can impersonate another person, or post content that is intentionally misleading.
title: Pseudonyms allowed

tosdr.case: The service allows you to use pseudonyms
tosdr.tldr: You do not have to provide your legal name (except for paid accounts for billing purposes) and you can use the service with a pseudonym.
